sentences.english: 'Madame has gone to Paris, ' Nanine answered.
sentences.chinese: “太太到巴黎去了，”纳尼娜回答我说。

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他与太太得灵及他们的2个孩子目前旅居在德国。

sentences.english: It is a paper that those gentlemen left for these ladies.
sentences.chinese: 这是那几位先生留给太太们的一张条子。

sentences.english: Mrs…has never really got on with her daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 老太太从未与儿媳妇儿真正和睦相处过。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: Highs: a wise decision in finding a good wife and a business that was doing quite well.
sentences.chinese: 成功的部分则会提及找到一个好太太和职场上的成功。

sentences.english: Mrs. Dursley sipped her tea through pursed lips.
sentences.chinese: 德思礼太太嘬起嘴唇呷了一口茶。

sentences.english: I like my wife, I just can’t live with her.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢我的太太，只是不能和她一起生活。

sentences.english: Mrs. Jennings soon appeared, and the note being given her, she read it aloud.
sentences.chinese: 詹宁斯太太很快回来了，一接到信便大声读了起来。

sentences.english: Seventy-five years after Mrs. Graham's cat fell into the freezer.
sentences.chinese: 在格雷厄姆太太的猫掉进冰柜七十五年之后。

sentences.english: She was a very kind and amiable old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他是个善良和气的老太太。

sentences.english: Suddenly the kitchen door opened, and his landlady came out into the hall. "Well, well. ""
sentences.chinese: 突然厨房门打开，他的房东太太走到厅子里来。

sentences.english: For appetizer my wife will have smoked salmon, but I preferashrimp cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 我太太要熏鲑鱼作开胃菜，但是我想要虾子。

sentences.english: His wife never cooks for him.
Mrs Rebuffed 2 people debate, o have tumbled down the stairs knocked at the end.
sentences.chinese: 太太回绝2人争论中，阿得从楼梯上跌下来敲到头。

definition: young lady of the house/wife of the young master
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
grandfather's sister/sister of a woman's father-in-law
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
